mapper.select: select lp.* from lte_gc lp where lp.mENodeBID =#{mENodeBID} order by lp.mCellID asc
mapper.insert:
insert into lte_gc ( mENodeBID, mBaseStationName, mCellID, mCellName, mFrequency, mPCI, mRsPower, mAntennaHangUp, mAzimuth, mMechanicalLowerInclination, mPresetElectricDip, mtotalLowerInclination, configName, createTime, createAt, projId ) values (
#{mENodeBID}, #{mBaseStationName}, #{mCellID}, #{mCellName}, #{mFrequency}, #{mPCI}, #{mRsPower}, #{mAntennaHangUp}, #{mAzimuth}, #{mMechanicalLowerInclination}, #{mPresetElectricDip}, #{mtotalLowerInclination}, #{configName}, #{createTime}, #{createAt}, #{projId} )
